t: Amazon.com Gift Cards
s: Beware of gift card scams. Do not provide any gift card details (such as the claim code) to someone you do not know or trust. Never use Amazon.com Gift Cards for payment outside of Amazon or its affiliated stores, and never use gift cards for other retailers and brands outside of their stores.

t: Redeem an Amazon Gift Card - Amazon Customer Service
s: Find the claim code on the back of the card, under the peel-off sticker or the silver scratch-off section. An Amazon gift card claim code is 14 or 15 characters long and will usually contain both letters and numbers.
